title: Ovarian cancer: Experts explain symptoms and signs behind menstrual cramps
description: Ovarian cancer, often a "silent killer," is the 8th most common cancer in women globally and the third in India. Early symptoms like persistent bloating, pelvic heaviness, appetite changes, urinary urgency, and menstrual irregularities are often mistaken for common issues. If these symptoms persist for over a few weeks, seeking medical attention is crucial for early detection and better outcomes.

title: Congress betrayed national song under pressure from Jinnah: PM Modi
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi accused the Congress of betraying 'Vande Mataram' under pressure from Mohammed Ali Jinnah, citing appeasement politics. He highlighted Mahatma Gandhi's praise for the song, noting its significance as a unifying force against British rule. Modi criticized the Congress's 1937 decision to limit the song's recital, linking it to the eventual division of India.

Indian-origin man charged with murder in California; was driving Tesla at 150mph
description: An Indian-origin man, Badal Dholaria, faces murder charges after allegedly driving his Tesla at over 150 mph while drunk, causing a fatal collision. The crash killed 41-year-old Alix Mari Sparks. Dholaria, who sustained only minor injuries, has pleaded not guilty to multiple felony DUI counts. Investigators found .08% blood alcohol content.

title: George Springer’s fairytale life with wife Charlise Castro, who built her own path
description: Charlise Castro, a former Division I softball standout and America East Player of the Year, forged her own path beyond being George Springer's wife. After excelling in athletics, she pursued an MBA and built a credible career in wellness coaching, demonstrating ambition and resilience. Her journey highlights how partners of elite athletes can cultivate independent identities and success.

title: Want to use your old smartphone as a home security camera? How to set it up
description: Transform your old smartphone into a home security camera with a simple app. This cost-effective DIY solution allows you to monitor your home, children, or pets remotely. By installing a security app on your old phone and your current device, you can set up a functional surveillance system. While convenient, be aware of limitations compared to professional cameras.

title: Gracie Hunt stuns with runway-ready style in intense mint training session
description: Kansas City Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt showcases her fitness journey, blending athlete-level intensity with stylish presentation in her latest Instagram workout. The 26-year-old influencer demonstrated a full-body circuit, highlighting her strength, discipline, and ability to make workouts visually engaging. Her posts inspire followers by proving fitness can be both fierce and fun, reflecting her mission beyond her family name.

title: Anna Kournikova and Enrique Iglesias combined net worth in 2025
description: Tennis star Anna Kournikova and music icon Enrique Iglesias boast a combined net worth of $160 million in 2025. While Kournikova's fame transcended her $4 million prize money through lucrative endorsements, Iglesias' wealth stems from over 130 million record sales and global tours. Both have strategically invested in Miami real estate, contributing to their substantial shared fortune.

title: SIR showdown: UP man returns home after 36 years for documents; family refuses to recognise
description: A monk, Sarvesh Sachan, sought police help in Kanpur after his family refused to recognize him and withheld his academic documents.  He had left home 36 years ago to become a monk.  Police verified his identity and allowed him to collect his marksheet for the SIR exercise, resolving the unusual family dispute.

title: Serena and Venus Williams’ combined 2025 net worth - careers and businesses explored
description: Tennis titans Serena and Venus Williams boast a combined net worth of approximately $440-445 million by 2025. Their immense wealth stems from significant prize money, lucrative endorsements with major brands, and successful business ventures including investment firms and fashion lines. Both sisters continue to be active forces in sports and business.
